page.title: 09TRANSPORT.POSTLING
page.content: The most serious matter for most in this district is the lack of public transport and the isolation of the scattered communities. This is intensified in Stowting and the north of Stanford, the former being accessible only through long narrow winding lanes and the latter being a village literally cut in half by the M2O Motorway with no adequate link for old and young people or cars between the two halves. The fast speed of traffic on the lanes, especially of heavy lorries & commercial vans is also of concern. The opinion of most people about the Channel Tunnel link with Europe is that although the affect upon this area has not been made clear,the decision has already been taken about the route of the M2O extension and the exit of the Tunnel.
